about_the_game:
As the fallen god, 'Signa,' leave a myth of light on this land. 


Tetris, Tenkai, Metal Slug, 1945......

The masterpieces of old arcades had something more important than just being fun.

Great graphics? Controls using joysticks?  They had something more important than that.

'Masterpieces looked fun at first glance.'

Games with beautiful art at first glance.
Games that you could understand at first glance.
Games that looking fun at first glance.

'A Straightforward game.'

That's SignaNota.


Features

  • You're not limited to just one companion. There are six heroines to accompany you.

  • There are multiple endings. Each heroine offers a unique ending.

  • A totally new combat system awaits you. Pull and launch Signa!

  • Perhaps, there might even be a hidden ending to uncover.

name: SignaNota

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G5500 / Core i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750Ti / AMD HD 7790
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: As the fallen god, 'Signa,' leave a myth of light on this land. We introduce you 'SignaNota'.  A roguelike slingshot adventure game that you can simply enjoy.
